select count(u.id) from [user] u where 1=1
and u.phone like '%' + #{phone} + '%'
and u.name like '%' + #{name} + '%'

select u1.id, u1.phone, u1.name, (select case u1.admin when 1 then '是' else '否' end) as admin, CONVERT(varchar(100), u1.create_time, 20) as createTime, CONVERT(varchar(100), u1.update_time, 20) as updateTime from [user] u1, (select TOP ${page*limit} row_number() OVER (order by id desc, ID desc) n, ID from [user] u where 1=1
and u.phone like '%' + #{phone} + '%'
and u.name like '%' + #{name} + '%'
) u2 where 1=1 and u1.id = u2.id and u2.n > ${(page-1)*limit} order by u2.n asc
